title: Eliminate workarounds in Terminal Logger
body:
We have had multiple workarounds in Terminal Logger that we should eliminate with time. 
This issue will track them.

Workarounds:
- [ ] [NuGet immediate messages workaround](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9407)
- [ ] [Special test message type for immediate rendering](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10203)
